contentBlocks.title: Requirements for lifts
items: Lifts must be configured to ensure lighting and ventilation in the car are turned off when unused for 15 minutes
Lifts must achieve idle and standby energy performance in Table J7D8a (e.g., load ≤800kg = Level 2, 801–2000kg = Level 3, etc.)
Lifts must achieve energy efficiency class in Table J7D8b (Usage category 1–4: Class C, >5: Class D, or for goods lift: at least Class D per ISO 25745-2)
